title: Please state the overall floor space index [Item 11(a) divided by Item 3(e)] plus the floor space index available due to Development Rights
clause_text: Please state the overall floor space index [Item 11(a) divided by Item 3(e)] plus the floor space index available due to Development Rights. Does the work consume the full floor space index of the plot, as given in item 6(b)? Is the building proposed with setbacks on upper floors?

source_pdf.text_snippet: Please state the overall floor space index [Item 11(a) divided by Item 3(e)] plus the floor space index available due to Development Rights.
